and performance. This is a git package, thus it compiles straight
from the GitHub repository.
(https://github.com/CiderApp/Cider.git)
name: cider

#: Manage all your JetBrains Projects and Tools
(https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/)

#: Full Regolith Desktop Environment, for the full stock experience.
An Arch Linux port of the Regolith Linux Desktop.
(https://github.com/regolith-linux/regolith-desktop)
name: regolith-full

#: Keybinding viewer for i3 and other programs.
Even though this is included with `regolith-full`, it is included as
it's used by `fnichol/dotx`'s i3 configuration.
(https://github.com/regolith-linux/regolith-desktop)
name: remontoire-regolith

#: Slack Desktop (Beta) for Linux (https://slack.com/downloads)
name: slack-desktop

#: A Linux compatible UI for the Elgato Stream Deck

name: streamdeck-ui
